message: I got back all the luggage I needed to take.
I don't think Thomas and Cordelia would be in a place like this......
Let's go check out the Dunwich mansion.
This key must be for that room that wouldn't open.
Looks like that monster is gone.
I changed clothes and put on the things I'd stacked up by the bedside.
Looks like they've seriously started thinking about killing us.
Thomas said that the 'Deep Ones' that attacked us are nothing more than food for the god Dagon.
It seems like the Pietro I saw in my dream said he was experimenting to increase the number of Deep Ones........
The lady said that her husband, who had transformed into a Deep One, was just an ordinary human at first.
She said that people from this village end up like that when they get old.
The village gravekeeper said that people here almost never die; before their death, everyone just disappears somewhere.
I wonder if all the villagers turn into Deep Ones when they get old and return to the sea.
The women who were forcibly mated with Deep Ones in my dreams...
The reason why everyone in the Dunwich clan had to be killed and then die themselves...

name: Gardner
message: Jonathan......

name: Jonathan
message: Professor, are you okay？

name: Gardner
message: Yeah, I'm fine, but...
It　looks　like　I　owe　you　an　apology.　I　never　imagined　such　a　monster　could　really　exist.

name: Jonathan
message: Nobody could believe something like that.

name: Gardner
message: But, if only I had chased after Thomas back then...

name: Gardner
message: I didn't believe a word you or Thomas were saying, not at all. I thought you were just babbling nonsense.

name: Jonathan
message: Please, don't worry about that.
It doesn't really matter anymore now, does it?

name: Gardner
message: But, your Cordelia is already...

name: Jonathan
message: It's okay, she must still be alive.
She has to be alive.

name: Gardner
message: Well then, let's go look for her right away.
The sooner the better！

name: Jonathan
message: No, before that, there's something we have to check.
We have to go to Dunwitch Mansion.

name: Gardner
message: What are you being so laid-back for?！
While we're doing this, Cordelia's life is...

name: Jonathan
message: Thomas isn't going to kill Cordelia so easily.

name: Jonathan
message: Because Cordelia is an important sacrifice for the 'Master' Nai talks about.
I don't know if Thomas knows about that or not.

name: Jonathan
message: Anyway, I have to take care of that first......

name: Jonathan
message: This is......my room, huh.
It seems Gardner brought me to my room while I was delirious.
I don't even remember how I changed my clothes or got into bed.

name: Jonathan
message: What's that sound？

name: Jonathan
message: Is someone there？

name: Jonathan
message: Professor？

name: Jonathan
message: No way......

name: Jonathan
message: That guy...
I jumped out of bed.
There's no time to change clothes, I've gotta get out of here fast...

name: Jonathan
message: That's it, Thomas's gun！
The door leading to Gardner's room was left unlocked.
I jump into the next room and lock the door.

name: Jonathan
message: Professor...... Professor, please wake up.

name: Jonathan
message: If we don't hurry, that guy...

name: Gardner
message: What is it... What time is it now？

name: Jonathan
message: We don't have time to be so laid-back.
He's already that close.

name: Gardner
message: What are you talking about...

name: Gardner
message: What's that sound？

name: Gardner
message: Did someone come by？

name: Jonathan
message: What are you babbling about?
There shouldn't be anyone at the Fish Scale Inn except for us！

name: Gardner
message: Then who.........

name: Jonathan
message: Hurry, please wake up, hurry！

name: Gardner
message: That is......

name: Jonathan
message: Wake up, quick！

name: Gardner
message: Jonathan, what the hell is that?

name: Jonathan
message: There's no time to explain.
Shit, is there anywhere I can run to......

name: Jonathan
message: There's no choice but to jump out the window.

name: Gardner
message: W-wait......

name: Gardner
message: I can't do it！

name: Jonathan
message: We have no choice but to do it.
That guy is planning to kill us.

name: Jonathan
message: Do you wanna end up like Marsh?

name: Gardner
message: Wait......

name: Gardner
message: Are you really gonna jump from here？

name: Jonathan
message: If you don't want to die, that's your only option！

name: Gardner
message: That's not something I could...

name: Jonathan
message: Come on, let's go！
